doc.field: Holds 41 of 67 tapes found in a box labeled "Biz Book." Includes surnames: Loren (1999), Lehmann (1999), Jannovitz (1994), Gilligan (1999), D'Agnato, Ward, Bisquat, Goodstein (1994), Montoya (1995), Hubers (1999), Rowell (1999), Kipper (1997), various on tape (2003), University of Illinois (1992), dictation (1994), "When Smart People Fail" (2 copies, 1988) by Carole Hyatt distributed by Church of Today, "The Selling Game" talk by Carole Hyatt distributed by NAFE, "Creating a Buying Atmosphere: Presenting, Probing, Blending" by Carole Hyatt (Transdesign Conf., 3 copies), "Setting Goals: The Playing Piece, Building Affinity and Listening Skills" by Hyatt (NAFE Conf, 3 copies); conference intro (1990), "Shifting Gears" by Hyatt at the International Conference on Outplacement (2 copies), Hyatt on WOR radio (1996), Hair Club for Men, Hamburg (1990), "Shifting Gears" (1991) by Hyatt distributed by Church of Today, Roy (1988, microcassette), and Jack Boland on "The 34th AA Anniversary." Also an envelope of 6 tapes related to "when she earns more" (1997).
Series III. Audiotapes >> Subseries III.B. Audiotapes, Not Digitized >> "Biz Book" Tapes (box 1 of 2)
